nodes.bodyText:
Is this to avoid the JFXDialog in UIService.showInDialog?
Otherwise I am not sure why you use this over the UIService.
No idea either. Maybe should do that.
Ok well I know now. Because then i need yet another Controller I guess cause I need a title and a cancle and save button. Not sure if uiService offers that
Hmm yeah I see what you mean since the UIService doesn't auto add the buttons. So it makes sense. Maybe a little off because it is not really a notification but not a big deal.
